meanings.definition: Radiothoriums: plural noun, radioactive isotopes of thorium
meanings.sent1: Scientists study radiothoriums to understand their properties better.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician handled the radiothoriums with caution.
meanings.sent3: The radiothoriums in the research lab glowed eerily in the dark.
meanings.sent4: The radiothoriums were like tiny glowing stars under the microscope.
meanings.sent5: The radiothoriums emitted a faint green light, indicating their radioactivity.

meanings.definition: Radiothoriums: verb, to treat with radiothorium for medical purposes
meanings.sent1: Doctors use radiothoriums to target cancer cells in patients.
meanings.sent2: The hospital decided to radiothoriums as part of the new treatment plan.
meanings.sent3: The idea of using radiothoriums in medicine seemed like something out of a sci-fi movie.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to fight the illness was as strong as the radiothoriums used in her treatment.
meanings.sent5: The radiothoriums worked like tiny warriors attacking the disease within the body.
